description.value: Primary Energy: Space 9 (mesmerizing illusion + medium range + 30ft cube) Supporting Energy: Time 2 (duration 1 minute) Range: Medium, 60 ft. (30-foot cube) Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 11 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Create a twisting pattern of colors in 30-foot cube at medium range. All creatures in area make Will saves. Compare your weaving successes to each target's save successes. Those you beat become Charmed and Incapacitated, staring at the pattern. Weave ends for a creature if it takes damage or if someone uses action to shake them (1 success ends effect). Creatures immune to charm are immune. Applies Effects: Incapacitated Saving Throw: Will Success Scaling: 0 = no effect, 1 = 1 round, 2 = full effect, 3 = 10 minutes, 4 = 10 minutes - 40-foot cube, 5 = 10 minutes - 40-foot cube
